definition: World Trade Organization (WTO)/abbr. for 世界貿易組織|世界贸易组织
World Trade Center (the twin towers destroyed by the 9-11 terrorists)
pinyin: Shi4 mao4 Zhong1 xin1 Da4 lou2

sentences.english: after World Trade Center was knocked down.
sentences.chinese: 在世贸中心被炸毁以后。

sentences.english: The concept and project status of design were introduced of ceiling curtain sound amplifying system for world trade building in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了世贸天阶天幕扩声系统的设计理念与工程概况。

sentences.english: Three years ago this month Usama bin Laden masterminded the assault on the World Trade Towers in New York.
sentences.chinese: 三年前的这个月，拉登策划了对纽约世贸大厦的袭击。

sentences.english: Police officers searched visitors trying to enter the area surrounding the World Trade Center.
sentences.chinese: 警察队进入世贸中心周边区域的游客进行安检。

sentences.english: Excuse me, I need to go to Taipei World Trade Center, but I don't know where to get off.
sentences.chinese: 您好，我想去台北世贸中心，但不知道要在哪站下？

sentences.english: Bagpipers took part in the ceremony at the World Trade Center.
sentences.chinese: 参加世贸中心纪念仪式的风笛手。

sentences.english: Verhofstadt congratulated China on its accession to the WTO.
sentences.chinese: 伏思达祝贺中国加入世贸组织。

sentences.english: One day, Peter wants to take the subway to the World Tread Center.
sentences.chinese: 一天，彼得想搭地铁去世贸中心。

sentences.english: Both companies claimed that the WTO's latest ruling bolstered their case.
sentences.chinese: 两家公司都认为世贸组织的最新裁定是己方获胜。

sentences.english: His company was the largest tenant in the Trade Center, a village nestled in the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 他的公司是世贸最大的房客，就象依偎在云端的村庄。

sentences.english: Family members mourned the loss of their loved ones at the World Trade Center.
sentences.chinese: 家属在世贸中心悼念死难者。

sentences.english: Go east and go all the way along Changan Avenue. The World Trade Center is on your left.
sentences.chinese: 往东沿着长安街走到头，世贸就在你的左手边。

sentences.english: I watched on television as the second plane smashed into the South Tower.
sentences.chinese: 当第二架飞机撞上世贸南塔时我正在看电视实况。

sentences.english: T. O. really serving the broadest interests here?
sentences.chinese: 如果没有，世贸组织真的是在服务于最广泛的利益吗？

sentences.english: Nor can I over-emphasise the importance of the WTO to Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 世贸对香港的重要性不容置疑。

sentences.english: How time flies! In a twinkling of an eye it is already 4 years since China acceded to the World Trade Organization ( WTO ).
sentences.chinese: 光阴似箭，转眼中国加入世贸组织已经整整4年。

definition: abbr. for 國際貿易|国际贸易[guo2 ji4 mao4 yi4]
Mt Tai 泰山 and Mt Hua 華山|华山/another name for Mt Hua
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
Jin Mao Tower, skyscraper in Shanghai
